name: PDF Whitepaper Analyzer
author: Shinkai

BasicConfig.description: A guide for analyzing the PDF text.

description: A tool to analyze PDF documents by extracting text and processing it with language models and search engines.

analysis.description: The analysis of the PDF content based on the guide.

projectAndAuthors.description: The project name, company, and authors extracted from the PDF.
